name: The Guesthouse Hotel

reviews.text: Stayed here for 4 nights in June 2013 as part of a group of 3 couples and our own 14 month old son.
reviews.title: As good as it gets!
Still a great place to stay!
reviews.text: We arrived after a long flight from Ireland to a hot and humid Chicago, weary after our travels.
We were instantly revived by the lovely Aircon that hit us on entering and by the luxury of this apartment (4th floor front)
reviews.title: Outstanding Andersonville

reviews.text: Amazing high ceilings, very spacious and modern kitchen and dining area, high tech entertainment system, BBQ and deck, a SAUNA in our bathroom! These are just some of the things that made this apartment probably a contender for the best accomadations we have ever stayed in. :)
reviews.title: Outstanding guesthouse with exceptional customer service!

reviews.text: Very child friendly with oceans of space was a real plus for us.
reviews.title: A great week with friends

reviews.text: We rented a three bedroom, two bath unit for four nights and could not be happier! We have rented condos all over the world through various means. Andersonville Guesthouse was fantastic! From the first contact through checkout everything was professional and easy. Lovely finishes, good location, and very, very clean. The huge steam shower in the master was a huge hit with my husband and our adult children. My husband is in a wheelchair and it was wonderful access from the front door all through the condo... not an easy thing to find in a vacation rental! The Andersonville area is cute and full of restaurants and shops, and a grocery store is a few blocks away. The Guesthouse will be our home away from home anytime we visit our daughter in Chicago!
reviews.title: Chicago Area Gem!

reviews.text: We just stayed at Andersonville Guesthouse for four nights and had a wonderful experience. The apartment was beautiful and well maintained. The apartment was spacious and had a fully stocked kitchen. The garage was perfect. It was great not to have to search for street parking. This was a great home away from home. This was an ideal place to stay if you want to be on the north side where there are few nice hotels and where parking can be a challenge. We would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Great Place to stay in North side Chicago

reviews.text: I rented out the 2 bedroom suite Mar 28th-Apr 1st for my 30th birthday and my experience was amazing. The place was more then I expected. I had everything I could possibly think of to be able to cook clean and entertain my guest. My guest had no trouble finding parking (since it was the weekend they didn't have to pay the meter which was a added bonus for them). The check-in and Check-out process was very well explained in the email I actually enjoyed learning all the codes and going in and out without having to take keys with me (because of the lock box outside my room). I will never forget my birthday and my stay at Andersonville Guesthouse and how easy and nice the experience was definitely plan on going back one day.
reviews.title: Best birthday weekend ever!!!!

reviews.text: As long we you don't mind being Andersonville, this is the place you should stay at. High sealings, garage spot, fully stocked kitchens are just a few of the reasons you should stay there. You would be silly to not consider staying here.
reviews.title: Best Value....and Best Quality

reviews.text: There is nothing like Andersonville Guest House anywhere in Chicago. I recently had my family stay here for my wedding. It was so nice to have both sides of the family in the same location. They appreciated having such a large place to stay, saving money by cooking 'at home' and not eating out every meal, and they were able to experience our lovely neighborhood, with a parking spot. The guest house is far more economical than a hotel downtown (which will charge you at least $30 a night for parking) and it is definitely nicer! I could not recommend the Andersonville Guest House more highly. My family can't wait to come back and visit!
reviews.title: Great accommodations in a lovely neighborhood!

reviews.text: I stayed here with my sister and my niece for a week in January. We have stayed in variouse vacation rentals in Chicago and I have to say THIS IS THE BEST!!! The units were niceley decorated, the kitchen had everything you needed to actually cook, the cable had everything you need to keep entertained, parking was on site, closets were huge, and the best part was the staff. Everyone was super friendly and helpful. I would definitely recommend it.
reviews.title: Loved it!!!

reviews.text: If you like the extra amenties offered by upscale hotels such as doorman, concierage, front desk clerk, bellhops, daily housekeeping and room service then the Andersonville Guesthouse is not for you.
reviews.title: Excellent alternative to a chain hotel

description: Want to live like a local while staying in Chicago? The Guesthouse Hotel offers an affordable and comfortable place to lay your head during your visit to our city! A family-owned, boutique hotel, The Guesthouse Hotel features spacious, high-end accommodations centrally located in a hip, bustling Northside neighborhood that still has easy access to Downtown shopping, restaurants, and activities. Our units feature either three bedrooms and two bathrooms or two bedrooms and two bathrooms-and a pull-out couch-to easily accommodate up to six to eight guests. You can whip up a meal in the fully-equipped gourmet kitchen (we're happy to point you towards a local Farmers Market or grocery store) or, when the weather calls for it, use the grill on your private terrace. Other highlights include an inviting living and dining area; spacious and elegantly decorated bedrooms; a spa-like master bathroom with a steam shower; a fireplace; a plasma television with cable; free Wifi; a free garage parking space; in addition to an array of other amenities and comforts. The Guesthouse Hotel has an excellent location in the vibrant Andersonville neighborhood, one of Chicago's most beloved neighborhoods. We're also nestled close to Lincoln Square, another neighborhood that brings the small-town vibe to the big city. The Guesthouse Hotel is just a short hop away from Wrigley Field, as well as public transportation (bus and train), which allows convenient access to downtown Chicago and tourist attractions (Feel free to ask us for dining, shopping, and tourist recommendations!) The affordable luxury of The Guesthouse Hotel and our unique location provide the perfect rental accommodation for travelers who want the comforts and independence of their own home while enjoying all that Chicago and its local culture has to offer.
